parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Prepares the camera bank angle.
<br><br><template><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>This command is '''non-functional'''!</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camPrepareBank''' bank

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> bank: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> _camera '''camPrepareBank''' -0.1 </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camPreload]], [[camCommitPrepared]]
</value></part></template>
